review: I just got my Fire TV Stick today. It was hooked up and ready to go in less than 15 minutes and I am no geek. The selection of movies and TV on Prime is great and I can even get Netflix. This is an amazing piece of technology. The only slightly annoying part s that I only have one plug in on my tv so I have to disconnect my cable to use it. But I'll find a way around that I'm sure.
author: Elizabeth Horton-Newton, Author "Elizabeth Horton-Newton, Author"

review: This product is a definite must if you want something small and easy to control. Most people who want the remote and something that will not take up space while playing their basic needs. This product is a definite must. Unlike the chromecast this is a product all on it's own and it doesn't require a "cast" in order to play stuff. It also allows amazon prime videos and netflix. The only complaint I have is the forward and rewind could be a lot better.
